I am an Assistant Professor at the Federal University of Juiz de Fora with a PhD in Business Administration from the Federal University of Minas Gerais. I teach courses on program logistic, operations and supply chain management. I also work as a consultant, helping businesses optimize their performance. Outside of work, I’m a dedicated runner and have completed two marathons. I enjoy taking care of my plants, and relaxing with my dachshund, Heinz.
